MAQUIAR.TITLE: MaquiAR
MAQUIAR.HEADLINE: MaquiAR: Aplicativo de try-on de maquiagem com realidade aumentada usando ARCore
MAQUIAR.PARAGRAPH1: Eu fiz o aplicativo MaquiAR como Trabalho de conclusão de curso para o Bacharelado em Sistemas de Informação na Universidade Federal de Santa Catarina. O app permite que usuários experimentem maquiagens antes de comprá-las online.
MAQUIAR.IMAGE1: Telas de navegação, favoritos, detalhes do produto e câmera do MaquiAR

PORTFOLIO.TITLE: Portfolio
PORTFOLIO.HEADLINE: Windows XP: Mateus Cechetto Edition
PORTFOLIO.PARAGRAPH1: I made this website as my portfolio to show my projects.
PORTFOLIO.PARAGRAPH2: The site simulates a Windows XP desktop.

URLSHORTENER.TITLE: URL Shortener
URLSHORTENER.HEADLINE: A URL shortener, like tinyURL
URLSHORTENER.PARAGRAPH1: This application returns a shorten URL given any URL. It was made as a coding test for a company that I ended being hired.
URLSHORTENER.PARAGRAPH2: System requirements (given in the code test):
URLSHORTENER.PARAGRAPH3: The site must allow users to short an original URL and generate a unique code with 5 or less characters
URLSHORTENER.PARAGRAPH4: The URL must not expire and if the same original URL is entered, the generated short URL must be different each time
URLSHORTENER.PARAGRAPH5: When the short URL is acessed, the user must be redirected to the original URL, with the least delay possible
